verses.verse: <S%H8055>Rejoice<s%> not, O <S%H3478>Israel<s%>, for <S%H1524>joy<s%>, as other <S%H5971>people<s%>: for thou hast gone a <S%H2181>whoring<s%> from thy <S%H430>God<s%>, thou hast <S%H157>loved<s%> a <S%H868>reward<s%> upon every <S%H1637%H1715>cornfloor<s%>.
The <S%H1637>floor<s%> and the <S%H3342>winepress<s%> shall not <S%H7462>feed<s%> them, and the new <S%H8492>wine<s%> shall <S%H3584>fail<s%> in her.

They shall not <S%H3427>dwell<s%> in the <S%H3068>LORD's<s%> <S%H776>land<s%>; but <S%H669>Ephraim<s%> shall <S%H7725>return<s%> to <S%H4714>Egypt<s%>, and they shall <S%H398>eat<s%> <S%H2931>unclean<s%> things in <S%H804>Assyria<s%>.

They shall not <S%H5258>offer<s%> <S%H3196>wine<s%> offerings to the <S%H3068>LORD<s%>, neither shall they be <S%H6149>pleasing<s%> unto him: their <S%H2077>sacrifices<s%> shall be unto them as the <S%H3899>bread<s%> of <S%H205>mourners<s%>; all that <S%H398>eat<s%> thereof shall be <S%H2930>polluted<s%>: for their <S%H3899>bread<s%> for their <S%H5315>soul<s%> shall not <S%H935>come<s%> into the <S%H1004>house<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%>.
What will ye <S%H6213>do<s%> in the <S%H4150>solemn<s%> <S%H3117>day<s%>, and in the <S%H3117>day<s%> of the <S%H2282>feast<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%>?

For, lo, they are <S%H1980>gone<s%> because of <S%H7701>destruction<s%>: <S%H4714>Egypt<s%> shall gather them <S%H6908>up<s%>, <S%H4644>Memphis<s%> shall <S%H6912>bury<s%> them: the <S%H4261>pleasant<s%> places for their <S%H3701>silver<s%>, <S%H7057>nettles<s%> shall <S%H3423>possess<s%> them: <S%H2336>thorns<s%> shall be in their <S%H168>tabernacles<s%>.

The <S%H3117>days<s%> of <S%H6486>visitation<s%> are <S%H935>come<s%>, the <S%H3117>days<s%> of <S%H7966>recompence<s%> are <S%H935>come<s%>; <S%H3478>Israel<s%> shall <S%H3045>know<s%> it: the <S%H5030>prophet<s%> is a <S%H191>fool<s%>, the <S%H7307>spiritual<s%> <S%H376>man<s%> is <S%H7696>mad<s%>, for the <S%H7230>multitude<s%> of thine <S%H5771>iniquity<s%>, and the <S%H7227>great<s%> <S%H4895>hatred<s%>.

The <S%H6822>watchman<s%> of <S%H669>Ephraim<s%> was with my <S%H430>God<s%>: but the <S%H5030>prophet<s%> is a <S%H6341>snare<s%> of a <S%H3352>fowler<s%> in all his <S%H1870>ways<s%>, and <S%H4895>hatred<s%> in the <S%H1004>house<s%> of his <S%H430>God<s%>.

They have <S%H6009>deeply<s%> <S%H7843>corrupted<s%> themselves, as in the <S%H3117>days<s%> of <S%H1390>Gibeah<s%>: therefore he will <S%H2142>remember<s%> their <S%H5771>iniquity<s%>, he will <S%H6485>visit<s%> their <S%H2403>sins<s%>.

I <S%H4672>found<s%> <S%H3478>Israel<s%> like <S%H6025>grapes<s%> in the <S%H4057>wilderness<s%>; I <S%H7200>saw<s%> your <S%H1>fathers<s%> as the <S%H1063>firstripe<s%> in the fig <S%H8384>tree<s%> at her first <S%H7225>time<s%>: but they <S%H935>went<s%> to <S%H1187>Baal-peor<s%>, and <S%H5144>separated<s%> themselves unto that <S%H1322>shame<s%>; and their <S%H8251>abominations<s%> were according as they <S%H157>loved<s%>.

As for <S%H669>Ephraim<s%>, their <S%H3519>glory<s%> shall fly <S%H5774>away<s%> like a <S%H5775>bird<s%>, from the <S%H3205>birth<s%>, and from the <S%H990>womb<s%>, and from the <S%H2032>conception<s%>.

Though they bring <S%H1431>up<s%> their <S%H1121>children<s%>, yet will I <S%H7921>bereave<s%> them, that there shall not be a <S%H120>man<s%> left: yea, <S%H188>woe<s%> also to them when I <S%H5493>depart<s%> from them!

<S%H669>Ephraim<s%>, as I <S%H7200>saw<s%> <S%H6865>Tyrus<s%>, is <S%H8362>planted<s%> in a pleasant <S%H5116>place<s%>: but <S%H669>Ephraim<s%> shall bring <S%H3318>forth<s%> his <S%H1121>children<s%> to the <S%H2026>murderer<s%>.
<S%H5414>Give<s%> them, O <S%H3068>LORD<s%>: what wilt thou <S%H5414>give<s%>? <S%H5414>give<s%> them a <S%H7921>miscarrying<s%> <S%H7358>womb<s%> and <S%H6784>dry<s%> <S%H7699>breasts<s%>.

All their <S%H7451>wickedness<s%> is in <S%H1537>Gilgal<s%>: for there I <S%H8130>hated<s%> them: for the <S%H7455>wickedness<s%> of their <S%H4611>doings<s%> I will drive them <S%H1644>out<s%> of mine <S%H1004>house<s%>, I will <S%H160>love<s%> them no <S%H3254>more<s%>: all their <S%H8269>princes<s%> are <S%H5637>revolters<s%>.

<S%H669>Ephraim<s%> is <S%H5221>smitten<s%>, their <S%H8328>root<s%> is dried <S%H3001>up<s%>, they shall <S%H6213>bear<s%> no <S%H6529>fruit<s%>: yea, though they bring <S%H3205>forth<s%>, yet will I <S%H4191>slay<s%> even the <S%H4261>beloved<s%> fruit of their <S%H990>womb<s%>.
My <S%H430>God<s%> will cast them <S%H3988>away<s%>, because they did not <S%H8085>hearken<s%> unto him: and they shall be <S%H5074>wanderers<s%> among the <S%H1471>nations<s%>.
